description.chatFlavor:
Rite of the Loyal Pack

Rite of Accord (Level 3)

Time: 2 hours
Cost: 6 Gnosis (spent on attempt)
Focus: A shared oath, mark, or symbolic act representing unity and mutual protection
Participants: The Garou performing the Rite and at least two willing allies who form a pack

Roll: Gnosis Roll (d20 + Max Gnosis rating)
DC: 16

On Success — choose ONE benefit. Applies to all willing participants for 7 days.

  • Shared Resolve: Once per long rest, when a pack member fails a saving throw, another pack member who can see or hear them may use their reaction to grant advantage on that save.
  • United Purpose: Pack members have advantage on one chosen ability check type (selected when the Rite is completed) when working together toward a shared goal.
  • Stand Together: Pack members have advantage on saves to resist frightened or charmed while within 30 feet of at least one other pack member.

The chosen benefit cannot be changed until the Rite is performed again.

Limitations: Does not compel loyalty or obedience; no effect on unwilling participants; does not stack; a creature may benefit only once at a time. Betrayal may end effects for that creature (ST ruling).

On Failure: Gnosis spent. Rite fails to take hold. Existing tensions may intensify. No mechanical penalties beyond narrative consequence.

description.value:
Rite of the Loyal Pack
Rite of Accord • Level 3

Gnosis Cost: 6
Time: 2 hours
Resolution: Gnosis Roll
DC: 16
Participants: The Garou performing the Rite and at least two willing allies who form a pack
Focus: A shared oath, mark, or symbolic act representing unity and mutual protection

Summary

The Rite of the Loyal Pack is performed to reaffirm unity, trust, and shared purpose among a pack. It binds the participants through recognition, not obedience, reinforcing their commitment to one another in the face of fear, division, and spiritual pressure.

This Rite does not create loyalty — it strengthens loyalty that already exists.

Effect

On a successful Gnosis roll, choose one of the following benefits. The chosen benefit applies to all willing participants of the Rite for 7 days.

  • Shared Resolve: Once per long rest, when a pack member fails a saving throw, another pack member who can see or hear them may use their reaction to grant advantage on that saving throw, potentially turning the failure into a success.
  • United Purpose: Pack members have advantage on one chosen ability check type (selected when the Rite is completed) when working together toward a shared goal.
  • Stand Together: Pack members have advantage on saving throws made to resist being frightened or charmed while within 30 feet of at least one other pack member.

The chosen benefit cannot be changed until the Rite is performed again.

Limitations

This Rite:

  • Does not compel loyalty or obedience
  • Has no effect on unwilling participants
  • Does not stack with itself
  • A creature may benefit from this Rite only once at a time
  • If a participant betrays the pack in a significant way, the Storyteller may rule that the Rite's effects immediately end for that creature

Failure

On a failed Gnosis roll:

  • The Gnosis is spent
  • The Rite fails to take hold
  • Existing tensions within the pack may intensify
  • Failure does not impose penalties beyond narrative consequence
